tool_description: Searches and filters media assets based on various criteria including metadata, product associations, and file properties.

query.description: Text search query for asset names or descriptions

date_from.description: Start date for creation date filter in ISO 8601 format

date_to.description: End date for creation date filter in ISO 8601 format

sort_by.description: Sort results by: date, size, name, or relevance

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

error_messages: Invalid date format: date_from and date_to must be in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid date range: date_from must be earlier than date_to.
Invalid size range: min_size must be less than max_size and both must be positive.
Invalid sort parameter: sort_by must be one of [date, size, name, relevance].
Invalid sort order: sort_order must be either asc or desc.
Limit out of range: limit must be between 1 and 1000.
Invalid offset: offset must be a non-negative integer.
usage: Use any combination of search parameters to find assets. Leave parameters at default values to skip those filters.

returned_count.description: Number of assets returned in this response
